import React, { Component } from 'react' class AddNewBook extends Component { state = { title: '', authorName: '', publisher: '', pages: '', summary: '' } handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.id] : e.target.value }) } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() //da se zanemari default refresh na stranata so stiskanje na submit console.log(this.state) } render() { return (
Add new book
) } } export default AddNewBook
